feature_descriptions.mt_lep_met: Transverse mass of lepton-MET system (tau decay signature)
feature_descriptions.pt_ratio_tau_lep_h: Ratio of tau+lepton pT to Higgs pT (momentum balance)
feature_descriptions.met_pt_h_ratio: Missing ET to Higgs pT ratio (neutrino signature)
feature_descriptions.deltar_tau_lep_sq: Squared angular separation of tau-lepton (decay topology)
feature_descriptions.mass_vis_higgs_diff: Distance from Higgs mass peak (125 GeV)
feature_descriptions.met_significance: MET significance relative to visible momentum
